about-me-content-1: Fullstack web developer with 2 years of experience working in Javascript, HTML and CSS, I have a strong orientation towards frontend, and I really enjoy designing and laying out web pages or applications.
about-me-content-2: In order to complement my frontend skills, I have studied UX/UI design, currently I continue designing and learning about it.
about-me-content-3: I consider myself a creative person and very attentive to details, which helps me when thinking and designing.
notatky-description: Note taking web application where you can create a profile and save your notes, you can also filter them by tags, add them to collections and more.
meteor-description: UX case study of a fashion e-commerce based on inclusiveness, it's an app where you can buy all models and sizes products.
radley-description: Web prototype of a fashion e-commerce where you can view, search and buy products, it has categories and a shopping bag.
contact-me: Do you want to contact me?
contact-me-sub: Either to be in contact or to collaborate on a project.
